import { useActionData } from "react-router-dom" import { DateSelector } from "../DateSelector/DateSelector" import "./SearchStayWithDate.css" import { useDate } from "../../context/date-context" export const SearchStayWithDate = ()=>{ const {dateDispatch} = useDate() const handleDestinationChange = (e)=>{ dateDispatch({ type :"DESTINATION", payload:e.target.value }) } return(
search
Search
) }
